title: Slamdance DIG (Digital, Interactive & Gaming)
desc:
DIG  (Digital, Interactive and Gaming) is a new showcase from the  Slamdance Film Festival  dedicated to emerging artists working in hybrid, immersive, and developing forms of digital media art. 
 DIG  represents a discovery of unique experiences. The new showcase features meta-narrative iPad applications, short films made for virtual reality, cubist-inspired video art pieces and video games being developed for PlayStation and the personal computer. 
 DIG  projects emphasize touch, personal visual perspective, and innovative connections between space and movement. 
 The full  DIG  line-up can be found at  showcase.slamdance.com/DIG
